content: Get insights to Tibetan arts and culture, enjoy the beauty of the Dhauladhar range, opt for trekking - there's much to do in Dharamshala.
title: 10 Best Things To Do In Dharamshala

content: Amidst modern structures, the capital city of India houses spectacular monuments from the Khilji, Tughlaq, Lodhi and Mughal dynasties. Rediscover the rich history of Delhi by exploring famous sites.
title: 11 Famous Historical Places To Visit In Delhi For A Heritage Tour
